movies.title: The Millennium Bug
movies.plot: When the Haskin family seeks refuge from Y2K hysteria in the isolated forests of the Sierra Diablos mountains, madness and terror find them there. Abducted by a vicious hillbilly clan, the Haskins fight for survival, but neither they nor the hillbilly Crawfords can comprehend the monstrous nightmare about to erupt from the bowels of the earth.
movies.simplePlot: When the Haskin family seeks refuge from Y2K hysteria in the isolated forests of the Sierra Diablos mountains, madness and terror find them there. Abducted by a vicious hillbilly clan, the ...

biography.bio: John Charles Meyer is an actor and producer, known for The Millennium Bug (2011), Avenged (2013) and Doctor Glamour (2012).
biography.name: John Charles Meyer

biography.bio: Jessica Postrozny is an actress and producer, known for The Millennium Bug (2011), Data Import 1 (2016) and The Hangover (2009).
biography.name: Jessica Postrozny

biography.bio: Christine Haeberman was born on March 19, 1981 in Porterville, California, USA as Christine Victoria Haeberman. She is an actress, known for Listening (2014), Murder Loves Killers Too (2009) and The Millennium Bug (2011).
biography.name: Christine Haeberman

biography.bio: Jon began his professional acting career in 1989 performing in a Second City (Chicago) affiliated sketch comedy show. He trained in theater throughout the midwest prior to his arrival to Los Angeles in late 1993. His credits include over 20 feature films, constant television guest appearances , and numerous work in commercials, infomercials, and print campaigns. Jon is an avid Ohio State Football fan.
biography.name: Jon Briddell

biography.bio: Ken MacFarlane is an actor, known for Caesar and Otto's Deadly Xmas (2012), Caesar and Otto's Paranormal Halloween (2015) and The Millennium Bug (2011).
biography.name: Ken MacFarlane

biography.bio: Trek Loneman is an actor, known for The Millennium Bug (2011).
biography.name: Trek Loneman

biography.bio: Adam Brooks is an actor, known for The Millennium Bug (2011), Zombies Vs. Strippers (2012) and Vaporized (2017).
biography.name: Adam Brooks

biography.bio: Ben started acting from an early age in theatre and first appeared on the Australian TV Drama Series Brigade des mers (1996). Seton was born in Sydney, Australia. He was raised in Sydney's Western Suburbs then moved with his family to Wombeyan Caves located in the Blue Mountains of New South Wales where he lived without electricity for a year and a half. Reading and telling stories by candle light with his three brothers sparked his interest in acting. His family moved back to Sydney where he attended St Ignatius College. He immersed himself in the theatre department and discovered a love for the Bard. In 1995 he won the Australian Young Shakespearean Artist of the year award and was presented the College Blue for Drama in 1996. At the same time he was competing in International Tae Kwon Do Tournaments and was the South Pacific Champion in 1995. He combined his loves in a unique sellout show called "Tae Kwon Shakespeare". This gained him recognition and he guest starred in BeastMaster, le dernier des survivants (1999) and The Lost World (2001). He co-starred with Lara Cox in The Dinner Party (2009) and moved to Los Angeles where he appeared on Fox Networks On the Lot (2007) and judges Garry Marshall, Michael Bay and Carrie Fisher commended him on an "excellent performance". He also starred as the lead in two Sci-Fi action films Vanquisher (2016) and Thrillseekers the Indosheen (2013).
biography.name: Ben Seton

biography.bio: Ginger Pullman is known for her work on You Should Meet My Son! (2010), The Millennium Bug (2011) and Alderson.
biography.name: Ginger Pullman

biography.bio: Sandi Steinberg is an actor and director, known for The Ungiving Tree (2016), The Millennium Bug (2011) and Strangely in Love (2014).
biography.name: Sandi Steinberg

biography.bio: Ian Pfister is an actor, known for Never Alone (2015), The Birthday (2007) and The Millennium Bug (2011).
biography.name: Ian Pfister

biography.bio: Dustin Yoder is known for his work on The Millennium Bug (2011), Side Effects of Barry (2013) and Too Fast (2009).
biography.name: Dustin Yoder

biography.bio: Benjamin Watts was born on July 1, 1981 in Williams, Oregon, USA. He is an actor and producer, known for Perish of Angels, False Awakening (2008) and The Mindy Project (2012).
biography.name: Benjamin Watts

biography.bio: Susan Papa is an actress and producer, known for Granite Rapids Moon (2017), Zoe and the Prince (2015) and The Woman Who Slipped (2014).
biography.name: Susan Papa

biography.bio: Bill Brinsfield was born on December 2, 1938. He was an actor, known for Slaughterhouse (1987), Warbirds (1989) and Top Dog (1995). He died on April 10, 2013 in Chestertown, Maryland, USA.
biography.name: Bill Brinsfield

filmingLocations.location: Los Padres National Forest, California, USA
